idea-plugin.name: Tunnel
idea-plugin.description: Program on the Go is an IntelliJ plugin designed to streamline your development workflow by enabling you to remotely build and monitor your Java applications from anywhere. Paired seamlessly with a Flutter mobile app, it generates secure public URLs and QR codes through ngrok, allowing instant access to real-time build statuses. If a build fails, Program on the Go leverages OpenAI's powerful language models to provide simplified error summaries, practical solutions, and can even apply suggested fixes directly to your codebaseâ€”saving you valuable time and effort.
